translation.en: Whoo. All right, guys, the Garvey Games announcements
are about to come out.
Ooh! I haven't been this nervous
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas été aussi nerveuse

translation.en: since I made eye contact with Kirstie Alley
translation.fr: depuis que j'ai croisé Kirstie Alley

translation.en: on that Southwest flight.
I love the Garvey Games, but I love their buffet even more.
translation.fr: J'adore les Jeux de Garvey,mais encore plus leur buffet.

translation.en: At a buffet, everybody wins.
translation.fr: Y a pas de perdants à un buffet.

translation.en: Well, except for the last guy.
The last guy does not win.
translation.fr: Lui ne gagne pas, c'est sûr.

translation.en: The Garvey Games are my least favorite time of year.
I prefer a competition of the mind, not the body.
translation.fr: Je préfère les compétitions de l'esprit,pas du corps.

translation.en: I bet you're gonna have a lot of dream catchers
when you grow up.
I didn't move here to lose. So...
translation.fr: J'ai pas déménagé ici pour perdre.

translation.en: -who's our real competition? -Ugh. The Ericksons.
translation.fr: - Qui sont nos rivaux ?- Les Erickson :

translation.en: Karine, her husband, Kory,
and their boys, Keegan, Kellen, and Kendall.
translation.fr: et leurs garçons,Keegan, Kellen et Kendall.

translation.en: All spelled with Ks because they are...
translation.fr: Avec un K parce qu'ils sont...

translation.en: what's the word? Monsters.
Oh! I know Keegan. We both play forward on the hockey team,
translation.fr: Je connais Keegan.On joue centres au hockey,

translation.en: and we're constantly competing for ice time.
translation.fr: et on se bat toujourspour aller jouer.

translation.en: He's a real butthead.
Yeah. The Ericksons have won the Garvey Games
the last seven years in a row.
But not this year.
Ooh! I cannot wait to see Karine cry tears of defeat,
translation.fr: J'ai hâte de voir Karinepleurer sa défaite

translation.en: and I will use those tears
to salt the glass of my victory margarita, which I will drink out of her skull.
translation.fr: pour saler la margarita de ma victoireservie dans son crâne.

translation.en: Wait, Mom, isn't Karine one of your oldest friends?
translation.fr: Mais Karine n'est pasune de tes amies ?

translation.en: Oh, my God, yes. I love her. She's my doubles partner.
translation.fr: Si, je l'adore.On joue au tennis ensemble.

translation.en: No, you do not want to peel that onion.
translation.fr: Non, tu ne veux pas savoir.

translation.en: The country assignments are in. Please, let us get USA.
translation.fr: Les affectations sont en cours.Il faut qu'on ait les États-Unis

translation.en: [all chanting] USA! USA!
Or Japan. Or any G7 country.
translation.fr: Ou le Japon ou un pays du G7.

translation.en: [all chanting] Any G7! Any G7!
And we got...
the Federated States of Micronesia?
-What? -Seriously?
-Come on! -Such a beautiful chain of islands!
translation.fr: - Allez !- Des îles d'une grande beauté !

translation.en: Okay, okay. You know what?
We can work with this. We can make this work.
translation.fr: Ça ira très bien.On va y arriver.

translation.en: Okay, now event assignments for the first round.
Lola, Pop-A-Shot.
Swish-swish, baby.
JJ, you're on Hula-Hoop.
I have hoop-bearing hips.
Show, you got shot put.
Oh, yeah, that's way more on-brand for me.
Last year, I had limbo.
I still feel bad I turned that stick to sawdust.
translation.fr: Je me sens encore mald'avoir mis le bâton en morceaux.

translation.en: And I will do the sumo event.
Ha! We are taking down the Ericksons this year.
translation.fr: On va pulvériser les Ericksoncette année.

translation.en: Hello. Aloha.
Konnichiwa. Guten Tag.
Don't forget about ol' Mandy.
Oh, no, honey. We didn't forget about you.
translation.fr: On ne t'a pas oubliée, chérie.

translation.en: We reassigned you to the most important position of all.
translation.fr: On t'affecte au poste le plus important.

translation.en: [gasps] Chairman of the Fed?
Team manager.
We don't want you to run. Remember what happened last year?
translation.fr: Tu ne courras pas.Tu te souviens l'an passé ?

translation.en: I do hate running. It's the yelling of exercise.
translation.fr: Je déteste courir.C'est le cri de l'exercice physique.

translation.en: Okay everyone, on three. One, two, three.
translation.fr: Tout le monde à trois. Un, deux, trois.

translation.en: [all] The Federated States of Micronesia!
Oof. That does not roll off the tongue.
-Let's try the initials. -Okay.
-TFSOM! -TFSOM!
-Yeah! -TFSOM!
...SOM!
Nope. That's much worse.
[sighing] I am so tired.
Did Mom really have to wake us up like that?
translation.fr: Maman devait vraimentnous faire lever si tôt ?

translation.en: What time is it?
It's tomorrow in Micronesia, so we're already behind!
translation.fr: C'est demain en Micronésie,on est déjà en retard !

translation.en: No one should have to get up at 4:00 a.m. unless there's a royal wedding.
translation.fr: Personne devrait avoir à se lever à 4 h,sauf pour un mariage royal.

translation.en: Hey, so are you sure you're cool with being the manager?
translation.fr: Dis, ça te dérange vraiment pasd'être chef d'équipe ?

translation.en: I mean, you're not really into sports, right?
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas branchée sport, si ?

translation.en: No. The only sports movie I like is Moneyball
translation.fr: Non. Le seul film sportif que j'aime,c'est Moneyball,

translation.en: because the hero is math.
translation.fr: car le héros, c'est les maths.

translation.en: Plus, I know Mom wants to beat Karine.
I'm so confused. What's going on with that friendship?
translation.fr: Je suis perdue.C'est quoi cette amitié ?

translation.en: Okay, let me break it down.
They've been friends forever.
They're super competitive, and they say they like each other,
but their words never really match their faces.
translation.fr: mais ce n'est vraiment qu'une façade.

translation.en: Love your top, Cassy.
I think I wore it last season.
Oh, but luckily, we live in Florida, where there are no seasons.
translation.fr: Heureusement, on vit en Florideoù il n'y a pas de saison.

translation.en: Oh, there are at my cabin in the mountains.
translation.fr: Si, il y en a dans notre chaleten montagne.

translation.en: Did I not tell you?
We bought a really expensive cabin in the mountains, in cash.
translation.fr: On a acheté un beau chaletdans les montagnes, en liquide.

translation.en: Oh, you paid in cash,
like the Russian mob or a drug dealer.
-So risky. -[laughs]
She smiles while she says mean things,
translation.fr: Elle sourit en disantdes choses méchantes,

translation.en: just like a British person.
Do you want the over or the under in the wheelbarrow race? Got it.
translation.fr: Tu veux miser sur quià la course de brouettes ? Ça marche.

translation.en: Are you gambling on the Garvey Games?
It's not gambling if you win.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas parier si tu gagnes.

translation.en: JJ, you know gambling is illegal.
translation.fr: JJ, tu sais que c'est illégal.

translation.en: Relax. I don't deal in cash.
translation.fr: Détends-toi. Je ne négocie pas en liquide.

translation.en: It's strictly a candy operation.
translation.fr: Notre monnaie d'échange est en bonbons.

translation.en: I got a guy on the inside in Vegas.
translation.fr: J'ai un type à Las Vegas.

translation.en: He works the high-roller counter at M&M World.
translation.fr: Il travaille au comptoir de M&M World.

translation.en: They have chocolate chip, blueberry, and churro.
translation.fr: Ils les ont au chocolat,aux myrtilles et aux churros.

translation.en: I got one of each 'cause they're free.
translation.fr: J'en ai un de chaque, c'est gratos.

translation.en: No. You can't eat that.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas manger ça.

translation.en: You're competing. You're important.
translation.fr: Tu as une compétition. Tu es important.

translation.en: Here you go, Mandy.
Yay. Manager pancakes.
Okay, Lola, listen up.
There are only three families we need to worry about.
translation.fr: Il faut se méfier de trois familles.

translation.en: The rest are amateurs.
The Ortegas,
great climbers, both rock and social.
-Got it. -The Roberts.
Canadian, but don't kid yourself,
they will step on your neck, and they won't say sorry.
But the real competition,
the thorn in our side,
the cavity in our mouths,
-the wedgie in our undies-- -Cassy--
translation.fr: la culotte coincée dans nos fesses.

translation.en: I'm talking about them.
Every year, the Ericksons get Team USA, and we get some terrible country.
translation.fr: Chaque année, les Erickson ontles États-Unis, et nous, un pays minable.

translation.en: I think they're bribing the school.
translation.fr: Y a du pot-de-vin dans l'air.

translation.en: In their defense, they did hire
translation.fr: À leur décharge, ils ont pris

translation.en: Usher's cousin to write the new school anthem.
translation.fr: le cousin d'Usherpour l'hymne de l'école.

translation.en: It's a real bop.
Happy Garvey Games, guys.
translation.fr: Joyeux Jeux de Garvey, les amis.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. I love the Micronesian shirts.
translation.fr: Oh, mon Dieu. J'adore vos t-shirts micronésiens.

translation.en: They're so wonderfully basic and thrown together.
translation.fr: Ils sont merveilleusement basiqueset faits à l'arrache.

translation.en: We were inspired by your makeup.
translation.fr: On s'est inspirés de ton maquillage.

translation.en: Well, good luck this year.
-Oh, my gosh. Good luck to you. -Oh! Give me a hug.
translation.fr: - Oh, mon Dieu. Bonne chance.- Un câlin.

translation.en: Oh, these feel so flammable.
-Good luck. -Yeah.
Oh, the National Resources Defense Council.
translation.fr: Le Conseil nationalde défense des ressources.

translation.en: I love that organization.
Their e-mail blasts are poetry.
Totally. I mean, we only have one...
translation.fr: Carrément. - On n'a qu'une seule planète.- Planète.

translation.en: [both] Earth.
translation.fr: - On n'a qu'une seule planète.- Planète.

translation.en: Exactly.
Hi. I'm Summer.
I like the way you think. Are you an NPFM?
translation.fr: J'aime ta façon de penser.Tu es une MFNP ?

translation.en: Uh, what's an NPFM?
Non-participant family member.
We're the family members who don't participate
translation.fr: Les membres de la famillequi ne participent pas

translation.en: in this trivial display of chest-bumping hubris.
OMG!
Hubris is my favorite H-word.
translation.fr: Orgueil est mon mot en O préféré.

translation.en: Mine's "helioseismology."
You know, you should come hang out with me and the NPFMs in room 2B.
translation.fr: Tu devrais te joindre aux MFNPen salle 2B.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, but I'm just here to support my family today.
translation.fr: Merci, mais je dois encourager ma famille.

translation.en: Okay. Well, it's up to you.
Favorite U-word, go!
[both] Ungulate.
Ung-you-later.
Welcome to the 17th Annual Garvey Games!
translation.fr: Bienvenue aux 17e Jeux annuels de Garvey !

translation.en: -[clapping] -There's nothing I'd like to do more
on my summer vacation than come to work.
translation.fr: venir au travailpendant mes vacances d'été.

translation.en: Yeah, and this year, we've added a sick new event:
translation.fr: Oui, et cette année, on a ajouté  une super épreuve :

translation.en: Hands on a WaveRunner.
Yeah. It's like Hands on a Hard Body,
translation.fr: Oui. Comme Mains sur une carrosserie

translation.en: except you put your hands on a brand-new WaveRunner.
translation.fr: sauf que là, vous avez les mainssur un jet-ski.

translation.en: The winner gets the WaveRunner,
translation.fr: Le gagnant repart avec un jet-ski,

translation.en: in case that wasn't obvious.
translation.fr: au cas où ce n'est pas clair.

translation.en: I've never wanted anything more in my entire life.
To kick off the games, let's welcome our mascot,
translation.fr: Pour lancer les jeux,accueillons notre mascotte,

translation.en: Manny the Manatee,
and our student band, the Bandatees!
Oh, oh, oh! And here comes little Desmond with the Garvey Games torch.
translation.fr: Et voici Petit Desmond avec le flambeaudes Jeux de Garvey.

translation.en: Yes. I had three to one on that kid dropping the torch.
translation.fr: Super. J'avais trois contre unsur la chute du flambeau.

translation.en: Knew he was a butterfinger.
translation.fr: Il a des bras en guimauve.

translation.en: Now, ironically, you owe me a Snickers.
translation.fr: Mais, bizarrement, tu me dois un Snickers.

translation.en: JJ, I'm gonna play you something I listen to to hype myself up.
translation.fr: JJ, je vais te faire écouterun truc pour te motiver.

translation.en: It's me... talking to me.
[Lola on phone] Lola, you're faster than lightning.
translation.fr: Lola, tu es plus rapide que l'éclair.

translation.en: Lola, you're nimble as a puma.
translation.fr: Tu es agile comme un puma.

translation.en: Lola, you're as strong as the bond
translation.fr: Tu es aussi forte que l'amitié

translation.en: between Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber.
translation.fr: entre Selena Gomez et Justin Bieber.

translation.en: I recorded this a while ago.
translation.fr: J'ai enregistré ça il y a longtemps.

translation.en: Hey, Micros.
I hope JJ's ready for the Hula-Hoop competition.
translation.fr: J'espère que JJ est prêtepour le cerceau.

translation.en: Kendall's Hula-Hoop trainer said that he has Shakira hips,
translation.fr: L'entraîneur de Kendall a ditqu'il avait les hanches de Shakira,

translation.en: and he don't lie.
Mmm. That's sweet. Yeah, JJ doesn't need training.
translation.fr: C'est mignon.JJ n'a pas besoin d'entraînement.

translation.en: As a baby, she sat, crawled,
Hula-Hooped, then walked.
I love Hula-Hoop. I love an ice-cream scoop.
translation.fr: Oui, j'adore les cerceaux.J'adore les gâteaux.

translation.en: I love anything that rhymes with "poop."
translation.fr: Et tout ce qui rime avec "popo."

translation.en: She's a genius.
All right, participants,
grab your Hula-Hoops.
And on my whistle, start hooping.
translation.fr: Et à mon coup de sifflet, commencez.

translation.en: -Okay, let's go. -[whistle blows]
-Go, go, go! Yes, JJ! -Come on!
-No, move your hips! -Move!
-Come on! -Move your hips!
What? Wait. JJ, what happened?
translation.fr: Quoi ? JJ, qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ?

translation.en: I bet against myself.
By losing, I'm actually winning.
Wicked smart, right?
Jennifer Jane, you cannot gamble.
translation.fr: Jennifer Jane, tu ne peux pas parier.

translation.en: You especially can't bet on the sport you're playing in.
translation.fr: Encore moins sur ta propre épreuve.

translation.en: Oh, that makes a lot of sense. They should make that a rule.
translation.fr: C'est logique.Ça devrait être une règle.

translation.en: It's literally the number one rule.
Okay, no bathroom breaks.
No food breaks.
No cutting the brakes on teachers' cars.
Fool me twice, James.
translation.fr: Pas deux ans de suite, James.

translation.en: -May the best hand win. -[whistle blows]
Hope you're ready to accept defeat.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu es bon perdant.

translation.en: Please. I've wanted one of these water motorcycles for a long time.
translation.fr: Je t'en prie. Je veux un de ses engins depuis toujours.

translation.en: No regular-sized man's gonna stop me.
translation.fr: Aucun homme de taille normale m'arrêtera.

translation.en: Oh, is that a water bottle from the musical Wicked?
translation.fr: Une gourdede la comédie musicale Wicked ?

translation.en: Yeah. You got a problem with that?
Uh, yeah, considering you probably don't even appreciate
what a soaring theatrical accomplishment it is.
translation.fr: la réussite théâtrale de ce spectacle.

translation.en: Please.
I've seen it 14 times and once in Japanese.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu 14 foiset une fois en japonais.

translation.en: Well, I've seen it with Idina Menzel.
translation.fr: Moi, je l'ai vu avec Idina Menzel.

translation.en: What? You've seen it with the OBC?
translation.fr: Quoi ? Tu l'as vu avec le COB ?

translation.en: The original Broadway cast?
Orchestra center, son.
You know, Garvey Prep should do that as their next musical.
translation.fr: Garvey devrait le fairecomme prochain spectacle.

translation.en: Oh, your Mandy would be a terrific Elphaba.
translation.fr: Ta Mandy ferait une parfaite Elphaba.

translation.en: She's got the pipes.
Thank you. And your son Kellen would be a great stage manager.
translation.fr: Merci. Et ton fils Kellenferait un super metteur en scène.

translation.en: Anything with a clipboard is where he shines.
translation.fr: Le bloc-notes lui va si bien.

translation.en: Well, he's out. Apparently, no WaveRunner
is worth listening to two supersized drama dorks.
translation.fr: ne vaut la peine d'écouterces deux ringards XXL.

translation.en: Mandy. Glad you're here.
translation.fr: Mandy. Contente que tu sois là.

translation.en: Let me give you a tour.
Okay.
So that's our meditation corner.
Those are feminist crochet beanbags.
translation.fr: Ce sont des poufs féministes en crochet.

translation.en: And, ooh, would you like some of our vegan charcuterie?
translation.fr: Tu veux de la charcuterie végane ?

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Did I just die and wake up in a TED Talk?
translation.fr: Je suis morteet arrivée à une conférence TED ?

translation.en: Welcome home, sister.
Thank you. I am never leaving.
Shoot. We're already down four medals to the Ericksons.
translation.fr: Mince. Ils ont déjà quatre médailles.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm about to school the USA in Pop-A-Shot.
translation.fr: Pas grave. Je vais leur donnerune leçon à l'arcade basket-ball.

translation.en: They call me the LeBron James of Micronesia.
translation.fr: On m'appellela LeBron James de Micronésie.

translation.en: Hey, Keegan.
I'm in your head now.
[coughing] Oh, my God.
That was a lot of chalk.
[Cassy] Okay, come on, Lola! Go, go, go, go!
Yes! Oh, my gosh, you're killing it!
Get it, girl!
-Yes! Lola! Whoo! -[whistle blows]
-[Miss Riggi] Micronesia! -Yes!
-Yes! -[yelling excitedly]
Yes!
Whoo! Yes!
-And the winner is... -Yes, yes?
-Yeah! -Yeah! Whoo!
-Yes! -Yes!
Jeez!
Yes!
What JJ doesn't realize is
I've been watering down her Capri Suns the whole time.
translation.fr: mais je coupe son Tropicanaà l'eau depuis toujours.

translation.en: No, no, no, we don't even allow those in our house.
translation.fr: Les jus sont interdits chez nous.

translation.en: I make my own drink. Half water, half lemon juice.
translation.fr: Je fais ma propre boisson.Moitié eau, moitié jus de citron.

translation.en: Call it Erick-Suns. You know, like our last name.
Oh, I get it, bro. And I love it.
All right, time check.
Three hours. What a waste.
translation.fr: Ça fait trois heures. Quel gâchis.

translation.en: Man, time really flies when you're connecting with someone.
translation.fr: Mais le temps passe plus vitequand on a un ami.

translation.en: Truth, man, truth. [groans]
My shoulder won't stop acting up after fixing Kellen's bike.
translation.fr: J'ai mal à l'épaule depuisque j'ai réparé le vélo de Kellen.

translation.en: Hey, let me at that shoulder. I'll show you a trick I learned
translation.fr: Laisse-moi faire.Je vais te montrer un truc

translation.en: back in my WWE days.
What are you-- Okay, man to man?
-Yeah. -This feels really good.
Ow! What?
And that's to remind you to stay on your side.
Good job, honey. [laughs]
Hey, guys, great news.
We're both in the finals. How fun is that?
translation.fr: On est en finale. C'est pas super, ça ?

translation.en: Oh, the funnest fun.
Can I just say that I am so glad it's your family we're up against?
translation.fr: Je suis bien contenteque nos familles s'affrontent ?

translation.en: Oh, so glad. I mean, like, so glad.
I know. I'm, like, super-duper glad.
translation.fr: Je sais. Je suis hyper contente.

translation.en: Wow. I'm gonna say something bold.
translation.fr: Je me hasarde à vous dire.

translation.en: I think that was my favorite Terry Gross interview to date.
translation.fr: C'était mon interview préféréede Terry Gross.

translation.en: Absolutely. Co-sign.
Wow. [sniffs] It smells like a public library in here.
Welcome, JJ. Please remove your shoes.
translation.fr: Bienvenue, JJ.Retire tes chaussures, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: Not happening, dawg. I just came to check on you.
translation.fr: Pas moyen, sœurette.Je viens voir si tu vas bien.

translation.en: Aw. That's so sweet.
But I've never felt so connected to a group in my life.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais été aussi biende toute ma vie.

translation.en: These people are my people.
So, nerds?
Oh, which reminds me.
I need you to hold my stash of Nerds.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu gardes ma réserve.

translation.en: Why are you giving this to me?
It's my emergency candy stash.
Don't give it to me.
Even if I beg, cry, or plead.
translation.fr: Même si je supplie, pleure ou implore.

translation.en: If I look like I'm dying,
and the only thing that'll save me is a Twix,
translation.fr: et que la seule chose qui me sauvera est un Twix,

translation.en: do not give it to me!
Jeez, I get it. So dramatic.
translation.fr: J'ai compris. N'en fais pas trop.

translation.en: Oh, hey, can you just toss me a Kit Kat for the road?
translation.fr: Tu me files un Kit Katpour la route ?

translation.en: Sure.
What did I just say?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que je viens de dire ?

translation.en: Hey, man, it's been really great getting to know you.
Sucks that we both can't have this WaveRunner.
translation.fr: Dommage, il en faudrait un chacun.

translation.en: I was thinking the same thing. It's like we have the same brain.
translation.fr: Je pensais la même chose.On partage le même cerveau.

translation.en: Well, here's a thought
that you probably are also thinking because we share a brain. Duh.
translation.fr: mais tu dois déjà savoirparce qu'on a le même cerveau.

translation.en: What if we take our hands off at the exact same time?
translation.fr: Et si on enlevait nos mainsen même temps ?

translation.en: And share custody of the WaveRunner?
translation.fr: Et qu'on alternait la garde du jet-ski ?

translation.en: Yes. I'll take it out Fourth of July, and you take it out Labor Day.
translation.fr: Je le sors le 4 juillet, et toi,à la fête du travail.

translation.en: I love that.
Hey, would it be crazy if we just rode it one time together?
translation.fr: Ce serait fou si on en faisait à deux,une fois ?

translation.en: -Whoo! -Oh, this is awesome!
-This is super fun! -Whoo!
Now I only want to ride this together.
translation.fr: En fait, je veux justequ'on en fasse ensemble.

translation.en: Let's take our hands off when I say go.
translation.fr: On y va quand je dis "partez".

translation.en: Ready, set...
go.
Ladies and gentlemen, we finally have a winner.
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs,on a notre gagnant.

translation.en: Gabe Iglesias!
Oh, man!
Oh, this is awesome!
I've always wanted to win one of these.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours voulu en avoir un.

translation.en: Oh, man, never wanted to buy one,
but I did wanna win one.
[sighs] Let me tell you something. The real prize, the real prize,
translation.fr: Je vais vous dire un truc.La vraie récompense,

translation.en: was watching
this beautiful friendship unfold and blossom right in front of me.
translation.fr: à l'éclosion de votre belle amitié.

translation.en: Two grown, adult men.
You two. The real heroes.
Do you have any family at this school?
translation.fr: Vous avez de la famille à l'école ?

translation.en: No. No.
Hey, listen, I'm a real big fan. You think you can, uh...
translation.fr: Je suis un grand fan.Vous pensez pouvoir...

translation.en: autograph it right there where your hand was, uh...
translation.fr: le dédicacer là où votre mainétait posée...

translation.en: before you lost?
Anything for a fan.
Oh, man, this is sweet.
I am never washing this off.
The ocean might,
but the memory will always be right here.
translation.fr: mais le souvenir sera toujours là.

translation.en: Here we go. This is gonna be my new dating profile pic.
translation.fr: C'est parti. Ça va êtrema nouvelle photo de profil.

translation.en: -Take that, Marsha. -[camera clicks]
All right, we're down to only two families:
translation.fr: Il ne reste que deux familles,

translation.en: the Wights and the Ericksons.
Now, here are your rules for the final relay race.
translation.fr: Voici les règlesde l'ultime course de relais.

translation.en: One, no open-toed shoes.
This isn't Bible times or a Phish concert.
translation.fr: On n'est pas dans la Bibleou à un concert de Phish.

translation.en: And two, all members of the family must pass the baton to each other.
translation.fr: Et deux, tous les membres de la familledoivent se passer le témoin.

translation.en: And by the way, instead of batons, we have eggs.
translation.fr: Et en guise de témoin,on a des œufs.

translation.en: Exciting stuff, fam.
Oh, Cassy, did you hear that?
All family members have to compete.
translation.fr: Tous les membres de la familledoivent concourir.

translation.en: Where's your other daughter?
Oh, no, all my daughters are here. Let's get started.
I don't see the middle one.
You know, the one with a thyroid problem.
translation.fr: Tu sais, celle avec un problèmede thyroïde.

translation.en: Mandy doesn't have a thyroid problem.
translation.fr: Mandy n'a pas de problème de thyroïde.

translation.en: -I knew you had another daughter. -Dang it.
translation.fr: - Je savais que tu en avais une autre.- Mince.

translation.en: Cassy, come on.
Look, I also want to win, but this is going too far.
translation.fr: Je veux aussi gagner,mais ça va trop loin.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
I'll go get Mandy. And her perfect thyroid!
translation.fr: Je vais chercher Mandyet sa parfaite thyroïde.

translation.en: [gasps] The 1911 Triangle Shirtwaist fire.
-Yes. -Yes!
Hey. Uh, let's go, honey. We need you to compete in the final relay.
translation.fr: Allons-y, chérie.Tu dois faire la dernière épreuve.

translation.en: But we're playing Historical Tragedies Pictionary.
What? Oh, no.
You're gonna have to come back to sad Pictionary later. Come on.
translation.fr: Tu reviendras à ce triste jeuplus tard. Allez.

translation.en: But I don't wanna leave this place.
translation.fr: Mais je ne veux pas partir d'ici.

translation.en: This is my heaven.
Mom, I think I'm an indoor kid.
translation.fr: Maman, je suis une enfant d'intérieur.

translation.en: Oh, honey, of course you are.
When you were four, you said your sworn enemy was the beach.
translation.fr: Quand tu avais quatre ans,ton ennemi juré était la plage.

translation.en: Look, Mandy, I am sorry.
What happened this morning when I sidelined you, that was wrong.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas dû te mettreà l'écart, ce matin.

translation.en: You know, if I participate, we're gonna lose,
translation.fr: Si je participe, on va perdre,

translation.en: and I'm probably gonna throw up. I've had so many pieces of cashew cheese,
translation.fr: et je vais vomir. J'ai abusédu fromage de noix de cajou,

translation.en: my stomach is barking.
And, honey, if we lose, that's fine.
translation.fr: Et si on perd, c'est pas grave.

translation.en: The family being together is what matters,
translation.fr: La famille, c'est ce qui compte,

translation.en: and whatever happens,
we'll have a lot more fun with you by our side.
translation.fr: on s'amusera bienavec toi à nos côtés.

translation.en: What do you say?
[sighs] Okay, Mom.
For you and only you, I'll do it.
translation.fr: Pour toi et seulement toi, je le ferai.

translation.en: Okay. Come on.
Okay.
Goodbye, soul mates.
I hope we meet again.
And, Summer,
I'll see you in the comments section of the New Yorker online.
translation.fr: on se retrouve sur le sitedu New Yorker.

translation.en: [loudly] All right, everyone.
I don't need this. My voice is a natural megaphone.
translation.fr: Inutile. Ma voix est un mégaphone naturel.

translation.en: If you break your egg,
you'll be disqualified,
and you'll be charged for the egg.
Eggs don't grow on trees, people. That's just science.
translation.fr: Les œufs ne poussent pas sur les arbres.

translation.en: We are so close to being champs, y'all. I can feel it.
translation.fr: On va gagner. Je le sens. Voilà l'ordre de passage.

translation.en: Okay, okay, here is the lineup.
translation.fr: Je le sens. Voilà l'ordre de passage.

translation.en: I will go first on dizzy bat.
translation.fr: Je commence par la batte ivre.

translation.en: Show, JJ, Slinky race. Lola, tunnel crawl,
translation.fr: Show, JJ, course de ressort. Lola rampera,

translation.en: and Mandy, you are last on tricycle.
translation.fr: et Mandy, tu finiras sur le tricycle.

translation.en: Wait, wait, you're putting me last?
That's way too much pressure.
Mandy, you'll be a great anchor.
But an anchor's the thing that literally stops the ship.
translation.fr: Mais je risque de faire tout saborder.

translation.en: Okay. [clears throat]
Oh, hey, Karine,
try not to use this in your signature egg salad.
translation.fr: essaye de ne pas mettre çadans ta fameuse salade.

translation.en: You know, the one that gave everyone gas at the school picnic.
translation.fr: Tu sais, celle qui a donnédes flatulences à toute l'école.

translation.en: At least I made something.
You just brought KFC.
Mmm. And it went so fast.
translation.fr: Et tout est parti très vite.

translation.en: On your mark, get set, go! -Oh! -[whistle blows]
Come on! Go!
-Okay, come on, Mandy, start pedaling. -Go, go!
I... I can't do this. Just disown me, so I won't be a part of the family,
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas. Je ne veux plusfaire partie de cette famille,

translation.en: and you can win without me.
Mom, I'm not a cat.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un chat.

translation.en: Snap out of it. You are a part of this family.
translation.fr: Réveille-toi.Tu fais partie de cette famille.

translation.en: And not only are you going to participate, you are going to win!
translation.fr: Et non seulement tu vas participer,mais tu vas gagner !

translation.en: Come on! Go!
-Yes! Go, go, go, go! -That's it!
-Mandy, go, go, go, go, go! -Yes!
-Yes! -[Big Show] You can do it! Come on, Mandy!
translation.fr: - Mandy !- Tu peux le faire ! Allez !

translation.en: [Cassy] Go, go, go, go!
Oh, my gosh!
Yeah!
Oh! Yes! She did it!
Yeah!
[crowd chanting] Mandy! Mandy! Mandy!
Mandy! Mandy!
Mandy! Mandy!
-Mandy! -No! No! Whoa, whoa, whoa.
No, there is no way they won.
No way. I challenge.
translation.fr: Impossible. - Je les défie.- On a gagné équitablement.

translation.en: No, no, we won fair and square.
translation.fr: - Je les défie.- On a gagné équitablement.

translation.en: No, there's no way
that your weak indoor child beat my Kellen.
translation.fr: que ta nulle de filleait battu mon Kellen.

translation.en: What did you say about my daughter?
translation.fr: Tu as dit quoi sur ma fille ?

translation.en: I said that she is weak and lame,
like the rest of your dumb family.
translation.fr: comme le reste de ta famille débile.

translation.en: Oh, Mandy! Oh, honey, are you-- [gags]
translation.fr: Oh, Mandy ! Oh, chérie, - tu es...- Mandy.

translation.en: Mandy. Mandy.
You know it's bad when Mom puts herself in a time-out.
translation.fr: Tu sais que c'est mauvaisquand maman se met au coin.

translation.en: She did get us disqualified for unsportsmanlike conduct.
translation.fr: Elle nous a fait disqualifierpour conduite antisportive.

translation.en: Yeah, the screaming, the rage,
the way she tore that trophy apart with her bare hands.
translation.fr: la façon dont elle a briséce trophée à mains nues.

translation.en: I fell in love all over again. [chuckles]
Look at my haul.
translation.fr: Regarde mon butin. Un autre super jour

translation.en: It's another great day to be JJ.
translation.fr: Regarde mon butin. Un autre super jour pour JJ.

translation.en: How much did you gamble?
A lot.
I thought candy was addicting,
translation.fr: Les bonbons ne sont pas addictifs,

translation.en: but gambling is very addicting.
They should warn people about that.
Wow. That is a lot of candy.
I bet everything on you.
You're my sister. I believed in you.
translation.fr: Tu es ma sœur. Je croyais en toi.

translation.en: Oh, JJ, that's so sweet.
I also bet ten to one you'd blow chunks,
translation.fr: J'ai aussi parié que tu dégobillerai,

translation.en: so I cleaned house, baby.
Cassy, I think you've been in time-out long enough.
translation.fr: Cassy, tu as passé assez de temps au coin.

translation.en: No, I haven't been punished enough.
translation.fr: Non, je n'ai pas été assez punie.

translation.en: Maybe you should roll up the newspaper and hit me on the nose a couple times.
translation.fr: Roule le journalet tape mon nez avec.

translation.en: Okay, first of all, you're not a dog,
translation.fr: D'abord, tu n'es pas un chien, et puis,

translation.en: and second, what's a newspaper?
I just... I cannot believe I acted like that.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive pas à croire ce que j'ai fait.

translation.en: Karine is supposed to be my friend.
translation.fr: Karine est censée être mon amie.

translation.en: Cassy, let me tell you a story.
translation.fr: Cassy, je vais te raconter une histoire.

translation.en: [laughs] So, you're telling me stories now?
Yes.
Back in Minnesota, I had this friend who was also named Lola.
translation.fr: Dans le Minnesota, j'avais une amiequi s'appelait aussi Lola.

translation.en: We hated each other,
but we pretended to be friends because we both had the same name.
translation.fr: mais on faisait semblant d'être amies.

translation.en: Well, that's dumb.
Exactly.
Things got really messy between Lola Two and me.
translation.fr: Ça a mal tournéentre Lola 2 et moi.

translation.en: Oh, so you were Lola Number One?
No. I was just Lola. Why does everyone always ask that?
translation.fr: J'étais juste Lola.Pourquoi tout le monde demande ça ?

translation.en: The point is, one day, I sent her a radically honest text
translation.fr: Mais un jour,je lui ai envoyé un texto trop franc

translation.en: saying I didn't want to be friends anymore.
Oh, you can just do that? That's an option?
translation.fr: On peut faire ça ?C'est une option ?

translation.en: Yes.
And the second I hit send, I felt a weight had been lifted.
translation.fr: Dès que j'ai appuyé sur "envoyer",je me suis sentie légère.

translation.en: You should do that with Karine.
No, you're... you're right. But how?
I think I figured out a way to fix it.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé un moyen de le faire.

translation.en: Did you Postmates wine? Good call.
translation.fr: Tu as commandé du vin ? Bien vu.

translation.en: -Hey. -[gasps]
Nobody's here! Go away!
You have breached the alarm system. You will be arrested.
translation.fr: Vous avez déclenché l'alarme.Vous serez arrêtés.

translation.en: Cops.
Two words: radical honesty.
Karine, Kory, how are you?
Okay, you know what? Forget it.
I am too tired from today to do this.
translation.fr: Je suis trop crevée pour faire ça.

translation.en: Karine, can I talk to you?
Okay.
[excitedly] Oh, hey, Karine. Is Kory here?
I mean, whatever. I mean, if he's here, I'll go say hi.
translation.fr: Je veux dire, peu importe.Mais je vais lui dire bonjour.

translation.en: You know, if you hear any laughing or...
translation.fr: Tu sais, si tu entends des rires ou...

translation.en: harmonizing, you know, just being polite.
translation.fr: de harmonisations, je suis juste poli.

translation.en: Whatever.
Okay, uh...
Let me start by saying
I am so sorry I threw an egg at your back.
translation.fr: de t'avoir jeté un œuf dans le dos.

translation.en: That was so childish of me, and I knew it was wrong
translation.fr: C'était puéril de ma part,et je savais que c'était mal

translation.en: because it felt so good.
No, no, no, no, no. Thank you, but I think that I was at fault.
translation.fr: Non, merci,mais je pense que c'était ma faute.

translation.en: And I don't know what this thing is that we do, but it's exhausting.
translation.fr: Et je ne comprends pas ce qu'on fait,mais c'est épuisant.

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna try something.
It's called radical honesty.
Here goes.
I don't want to be friends with you anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus être amie avec toi.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I feel the exact same way.
Oh! [laughs] This is, like, the first thing we've ever agreed on.
-This is amazing. I feel so alive. -[laughing]
translation.fr: C'est incroyable. Je me sens si vivante.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. So, what do we do next?
Well, pfft, I'll tell you what we don't have to do.
translation.fr: Voilà ce qu'on ne va plus faire. Cafés,

translation.en: -Coffee, yogalates, bag parties, -Ugh. Yes.
translation.fr: Voilà ce qu'on ne va plus faire. Cafés, yogalates, soirées tupperwares,

translation.en: co-chairing the school dance.
-Never. -Winesday, Thurswine.
-Brunch... -Yes.
-...uh, football Sunday... -Yeah.
-...annual Cabo trip... -Oh, God.
...and Christmas dinner.
Wait,
so can we not be friends on social media?
translation.fr: on peut ne plus être amiessur les réseaux sociaux ?

translation.en: -Yes. -[laughs]
A thousand times, yes.
Okay. Okay. Grab your phones.
We are going to consciously unfriend each other right now.
-Okay. -Okay. Facebook first. On three.
translation.fr: - D'accord.- D'accord. Facebook d'abord. À trois.

translation.en: One, two, three.
[laughs] Okay, now, Instagram.
-Done. -One, two, three.
Everyone, Karine and I have an announcement to make.
translation.fr: Tout le monde, Karine et moiavons une annonce à faire.

translation.en: We are no longer friends.
Wait, wait, wait. What does that-- Wait. What?
This is good. Yeah, it's good.
-Thank you, and I look forward... -Thank you.
...to ignoring you in the hallways at school.
translation.fr: de t'ignorer dans les couloirsde l'école.

translation.en: -See you not later. -Hmm. See you not later.
Done. Done. Done. Done.
Let's go home, Kory. I'm done.
Can we still be friends?
Nah, bro. Dolls before Guys and Dolls.
Does this mean we're not seeing Guys and Dolls together?
translation.fr: On verra pas Guys and Dolls ensemble ?

translation.en: No, of course we're seeing G and D together.
translation.fr: Si, bien sûr qu'on ira ensemble.

translation.en: Who's gonna get mad if we just happened to sit next to each other
translation.fr: Et qui sera furieux de nous voircôte à côte

translation.en: wearing matching fedoras?
Probably the people behind you.
Cassy, we're proud of you.
translation.fr: Cassy, on est fiers de toi.

translation.en: Oh, and I'm proud of you.
translation.fr: Et je suis fière de toi.

translation.en: Guys, no matter what anyone says,
we won the Garvey Games,
translation.fr: on a gagné les Jeux de Garvey,

translation.en: and we did it by sticking together as a family.
translation.fr: on a gagné les Jeux de Garvey, et on l'a fait en famille.

translation.en: Okay, everyone, Micronesia on three.
translation.fr: D'accord, tout le monde,Micronésie à trois.

translation.en: One, two, three.
[all] The Federated States of Micronesia!
Nope, never gonna work.
We better get something good next year.
translation.fr: J'espère qu'on aura mieux l'an prochain.

translation.en: And the Garvey Games country for this year is...
translation.fr: Et le nom de l'équipepour cette année est...

translation.en: the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg?
Come on!
